plain:
Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that the user enjoys:
Fantasy and Historical Fiction
Complex and Multi-layered Plot
Medieval and Fantasy Settings
Rich and Descriptive Writing
Longer Length
Women and Coming of Age as a theme
Slow and Detailed Pacing
Non-linear Narrative Structure
Family and Relationships as themes.
The user also seems to enjoy books that are well-crafted, thought-provoking, and have a strong sense of character development.
